div1.head: Photograph of wards and operating room, Post Hospital, Columbia Barracks, Havana, Cuba, [1900]
div1.p:
WARDS AND OPERATING ROOM, POST HOSPITAL, U.S.A., COLUMBIA BARRACKS (HAVANA)
Moran thinks it
may be
Is this Reed's
lab?
NO
Please return
The ward on the right with its connecting
covered passage way seems to be in the
process of being built
The small building was one of the original
shacks close to the new op. room. It was
torn down. The passage way has just
being built. It was covered with heavy
red tile and collapsed once. Have a good
story about it but can't write about it.
Will tell it to you.
Am glad to see this picture. It is
a little different from mine. I have
another (with me in it) showing the 1st two buildings only.
